t: Is alcohol shipping from Amazon in our future?
s: February 21, 2023 - Post-Prohibition alcohol laws, implemented to straighten out the flawed and corrupt system of the late 1800s and early 1900s, had the unintended effect of creating a monopoly in the alcohol market.
